> [salamander](#comment_1_1PMRgY6WGmrxwCPDTmESDEFXbZXsjg8WLk): I doubt zeronet will amount to anything, even Tor never gained such usage. If governments censor the internet, zeronet would not be difficult for them to remove completely.
